mapper.select: select `oid`,`Code`,`RenderDate`,`ctype`,`deptIDs`,`Status`,`Remark`,`RenderDepart`,`MineLeader`,`BusinessLeader`,`EditUser`,`EditTime`,`UptTime`,`UptUser`,(select funcGetDeptName(deptIDs)) as `Ext1`,`Ext2`,`Ext3` from labourreportstaticmain where oid = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from labourreportstaticmain where oid in
#{oid}
mapper.select: select lmain.`oid`,lmain.`Code`,lmain.`RenderDate`,lmain.`ctype`,lmain.`deptIDs`,lmain.`Status`,lmain.`Remark`,lmain.`RenderDepart`,lmain.`MineLeader`,lmain.`BusinessLeader`,lmain.`EditUser`,lmain.`EditTime`,lmain.`UptTime`,lmain.`UptUser`,srdc.name as `Ext1`,lmain.`Ext2`,lmain.`Ext3` from labourreportstaticmain lmain,sys_report_dept_category srdc where lmain.deptIDs=srdc.rdc_id and lmain.oid = #{value}
